runs.comm: nearly in the block hole with some inswing on middle and off, driven down to mid-on
deceives the batsman with a full slower ball, it goes away from Rutherford after pitching around off as he tried to push it
attempted yorker towards leg stump, the batsman drives on the leg side this time for three
in the block hole on off, Devcich defends the inswinger
short ball just outside off, Devcich sways out of the way
another slower ball to end the over, gets the outside edge by pitching it up but it falls short of the keeper
Kula strikes first ball! Pitched it up outside off with the angle, Rutherford drove and gave the outside edge to the keeper for an easy catch
short of length outside off and shaping away, left alone by Broom
comes in from length around off, Broom tucks it to the leg side past midwicket and gets three as Kusal dives to stop it just inside the boundary
length ball on the pads, worked to deep fine leg for one
on length well outside off, cut to third man
on length outside off, Devcich puts his front foot out of the way and slams it to the long-on boundary for a one-boucne four
length ball coming into the batsman who defends it to mid-on
short of length and angled in, tucked to deep midwicket for two

that's gone high and taken easily. Mathews bowled a bouncer and Broom replied by coming down the track in an attempt to pull it but gave a leading edge that went high and Mendis took it with both hands at mid-on
Mathews pitched it outside off with the angle and Devcich stayed back to cut it and pierced the gap between point and cover point for a four with beautiful timing
on length outside off, stays back and defends towards cover point, doesn't get the middle of the bat
pitched up outside off, Devich drives and misses
angled into Latham from outside off on length, he defends off the back foot
length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
short of length outside off and comes in with the angle, Latham defends off the back foot towards cover
from wide of the crease and well outside off, Latham moves towards off and gets a thick outside edge to third man
outside off, Devcich wants to scoop it fine on the leg side but can't connect and gets a leg bye off the thigh pad on the leg side
on length outside off, Latham pushes it on off and gets an inside edge to the leg side for one
tossed up outside off, batsman drives and cover point dives to keep it to a single
flighted and outside off, he tries to sweep but is struck on the leg outside off and the appeal is turned down
full and outside off, driven to backward point
full on leg, driven on the leg side for one
the full ball outside off is punished this time as Devcich drives it handsomely past point for a cracking four
another big appeal as he tried to sweep but couldn't connect but was struck just outside off
slow ball on the stumps with a roll of the fingers, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single
the bouncer is sent flying away for six! Just around the off stump and Devcich pulled it just in time for a six over the deep midwicket boundary

defends on off with soft hands for a quick single but is sent back and there's a direct hit! Took Devcich a bit of time to get to almost halfway down the track and turn around but there was no fielder near the ball and there was enough time for him to dive back
in the block hole and it's four. Full on middle and leg with a hint of inswing, the batsman drove it in the air just past Malinga and it beats the mid-on fielder for four
slower ball on length on middle, Devcich defends it carefully
short of length outside leg, worked to short fine leg and there's a misfield. Gives them enough time for two extra runs
full and outside off, driven to sweeper cover for one
on length on off, comes down and drives it back to the bowler
on length on middle, turned to the leg side with a forward defense
on length outside off, pushed to cover point
full and just outside off, driven to the fielder in deep outside off
comes down the pitch and drives the length ball past cover for one to keep strike
length ball on the stumps, driven on the on side for one
carom ball pitched up and clipped to deep square leg for one
quicker one down the leg side is worked to deep fine leg

and that's got called teamwork! Slower through the air on leg, Devcich goes for the slog and it's gone high the air. Fielders from long-on and deep midwicket are converging and while Kusal dropped it, the ball popped out of his hands and Kulasekara took it to complete the catch
on leg, tucked to leg side for one
quicker one rushing towards off stump form length, Munro defends
full on off, driven by dancing down the track and Mendis dives to his right from the long-off boundary
big appeal for lbw as it hit him just in front of off but he was a long way down in an attempt to work it on leg
goes to the back foot and defends the ball on off to leg side for one
turning away after pitching outside off on length, goes past the outside edge
stopped for nearly a second before bowling that and the batsman reverse swept it to deep cover
outside off and swept to deep midwicket for one
comes down and drives it to cover
on length on off, comes down again and pushes it back to Dilshan
slightly short on off, goes back to the back foot and cuts it to deep backward point
on length on middle and leg, defends on the leg side and scoots away for a quick single as Dilshan tries a direct hit at non-striker's but misses
comes down and lofts the length ball outside off over the covers for a well-timed four
fuller on leg, whipped on the leg side for one

the full delivery gets him a wicket. He was pitching it up consistently and Latham swing his bat this time to hand it to Dilshan at backward point. He took it over his head and threw the ball high in the air - first wicket for Rambukwella
pushed to mid-on after it pitched around off and came in
cut to sweeper cover after it pitched outside off
low full toss outside leg, pushed down to long-on
turns into him after pitching outside off, pushed down to long-on for one
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
length ball towards middle and leg, turned to deep midwicket
quicker one outside off, chopped to the off side
slower one outside off, cuts it late to point
short of length around off, pushed down to long-on
turns in after pitching outside off, punched to cover where Kusal dives but can't stop the single
full outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
length ball on leg, Munro goes to the back foot and punches it long-off
length ball coming into off, pushed down to long-on for one
full outside off, Munro goes for the big heave on the leg side and misses
on the stumps, Munro plays it cleverly by cutting it late and finding the gap between point and short third man for four
one more! This was shorter and outside off, he just had to stay back and cut it on the other side of the point fielder to beat the sweeper cover for four
yorker outside leg, clipped to deep midwicket for one
goes back at the crease and punches him down to long-on
tossed and full and Ronchi drives wide of cover, long-off runs to his left and he dives in vain, quick outfield
back to back boundaries! Tossed up a bit more and he bashes this half volley down the ground, to the straight boundary
Mendis lucky to get away with a half tracker, he pulls straight to deep midwicket
wide outside off and he dabs this one down to deep point
full and wide outside off and he drives to sweeper cover
length ball going down leg, tries a heave but misses and the ball stays on the pitch
from the back of the hand outside off, slapped to deep midwicket for one
short ball outside off is cut straight to point

short ball gets the wicket but on the off side. It was just outside off and Munro put his bat in the way and the ball went high towards third man with the bounce, good catch by Kula and NZ are stuttering here
slower ball outside off, pushed towards mid-on for one
length ball coming from off, defends it towards cover
length delivery on off, pushed towards cover where a fumble gives them one
short of length outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
full and wide and he drives it right between point and third man all along the ground for four. It raced away to the boundary
short of length outside off and coming in, pushed to cover
swingin in from outside off, thick inside edge goes to leg and the 100 comes up

dropped by Rambukwella! It was short of length outside off, Ronchi was late with the half-pull and it went high in the air. Rambukwella was running back from cover, got there in time and even had it in his hands but it came out in no time
coming into the stumps from off, turned to deep midwicket
quick one into the pads, gets a leg bye in an attempt to flick it
goes all the way! Came down the track, picked the ball early which was slower and shorter and launched it over the long-on boundary for four
angles it in from off, Ronchi sways out of the line to cut it to third man but misses
full and outside off, Ronchi makes room but misses
slower and back of length around off, Ronchi picks the leg side again by pulling it to the wide long-on boundary for a one bounce four
in the block hole and it's flicked towards deep midwicket for two
in the block hole again on leg, driven down to long-on for two
low full toss on the leg stump, clipped over midwicket to the deep, two more
yorker on leg, flicked to midwicket to give Ronchi the strike
bang in the block hole, Ronchi digs it out to midwicket and Malinga runs to stop the ball to keep it to one
full outside off, McCullum swivels his bat and it lands just over Kulasekara who was running towards the boundary from cover and they get two more
full around off, driven down to long-off for one
slower one is full around off, tries a big heave but it goes to midwicket
full outside off, driven off the back foot to deep point
low full toss on the legs and he's picked it to the wide long on boundary and Mahela runs but can't get there on time
slower one is full on the stumps and he makes room to crash it through the covers, wide of the fielder to beat the long-on fielder for four more
comes down and pushes the low full toss to long-on, the fielder gets there but they come back quickly for two as the throw isn't accurate
right in the block hole, can't get it past the bowler
full outside off, drives it firmly to cover for one

nearly in the block hole, swivel of the bat sends the ball to deep point and they are coming back for the second. The throw was a bit inaccurate but Sangakkara went to his right, facing point, caught it with his right hand and threw the ball to the stumps for a run-out
full outside off, driven down the ground for two and a fumble from long-on gives them enough time for two
it's dead straight in front of the stumps and the finger goes up. Pitched on middle on length, was going straight as he tried to flick but missed and hit him right in front of middle. Plumb it is

full delivery on middle and leg, inside edge goes to deep fine leg and they are coming back for the second. Ellis would have been run out too but Sangakkara doesn't collect the throw and Ellis dives to make his crease
